K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-003:8b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-003:8b-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-003:8b-8: bee ro tsa na rashmi sanytso di te a'a gatstsha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-003:8b-9: a'arya a'a k'a sha garbha mah'a k'a ru ni ka p'u ra ya ha sh'a na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-003:8b-10: dh'a ra ya buddhe bi shtsa ya na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-003:8b-17: dug dang; dug sbyar ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-003:8b-18: byad stems rnams kyis mi tshugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-003:8b-20: chom rkun la sogs pa thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-003:8b-21: gang du bris te bzhag pa der yams kyi nad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-003:8b-23: 'go ba'i nad thams cad mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-003:8b-24: dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-003:8b-25: 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so //
